item.title: The Growth of High-Performance Machine Learning
item.description: Machine learning, the hype that is being talked about around most of the water coolers, feels like a magic box for most laymen. Artificial Intelligence (AI) is on the rise more than ever, and for most people it seemed to come out of nowhere. However, what they don’t know is that most of the theoretical work was already laid out over 50 years ago. The technology that is in use today didn’t come out of nowhere, but is the result of years of research in computer science, psychology and mathematics.
